items.sentence: I can\'t tell you how creepy this makes me feel.
Tom died three weeks before I got out of prison.
Tom has been working here more than three years.
Tom hoped Mary would stay in Boston for a while.
How long did Tom say he\'d been studying French?
I didn\'t even know that Tom could speak French.
Tom told me that he forgot where he hid the key.
Tom\'s cat brought him a dead bird as a present.
Tom\'s hat and coat are on the chair over there.
Tom\'s house is on the other side of the street.
Tom\'s mother told him not to play with matches.
This is in one of the largest zoos in the world.
This is one of the shirts my mother made for me.
Don\'t bother to try to convince Tom to do that.
Tom, the guy I\'m sharing a room with, is messy.
I\'m sure Tom would be happy to show you around.
Tom is by no means sure of winning the election.
Tom knows better than to do something like that.
Is this the first time you\'ve ever given blood?
Tom always takes his time in everything he does.
